name: Run Like Hell (imeka)
description:
The Devil stipulated that every soul that enters the realm will have the chance to become one of his demons and avoid torture. But only if they can get to the end of a certain area without getting caught by any demon. Could that be true? Or is he just playing with the newcomers?

CONTROLS

Enter = Start the game

Space Bar / Up arrow / W = Jump

Esc / P = Pause

R = Restart
